content: Noticed this morning I can't get any Changelog episode audio to load via Apple podcasts. Tried the autonomous drone episode as well as the news from earlier this week, both via the main feed. Podcasts from other people work fine
changelog.com seems to be down as well

I'm having no issues here. This might be another instance of this:

https://github.com/thechangelog/changelog.com/issues/553

Would you mind running those curl commands that @Gerhard posted in the final comment and adding your findings to the issue?
np. i tried both from my phone and macbook but its on the same wifi
